sentences.en: A speculator may try to amass great wealth.
sentences.cn: 投机商会想方设法积聚钱财.

sentences.en: By his own admission, he evaded taxes as a Florida real-estate speculator.
sentences.cn: 他亲口承认自己在佛罗里达从事房地产投机生意时逃过税。

sentences.en: Dickson Watts , the famous turn - of - the - century cotton speculator, once said, " Run quickly or not at all. "
sentences.cn: 本世纪初, 赫赫有名的棉花投机者迪克森.华茨曾经说过, 在这种情况下 “ 要快点跑,否则就熬下去 ”.

sentences.en: From apparently look, this banking crisis is caused directly by the congenial behavior of international speculator.
sentences.cn: 从表面上看来, 这场金融危机是由国际投机商的投机行为直接引发的.

sentences.en: He is a traitor, a speculator!
sentences.cn: 他简直是个卖国贼 、 投机家!

sentences.en: He is speculator who hold up customers.
sentences.cn: 他是个向顾客索取高价的投机商人.

sentences.en: In the sterling crisis in 1992, led a gang of Soros speculator successfully blocked a pound.
sentences.cn: 在1992年英镑危机中, 索罗斯带领一帮投机家成功地阻击了英镑.

sentences.en: Losses make the speculator studious -- not profits.
sentences.cn: 赔钱 不能赢利,但能使投机者细心钻研.

sentences.en: Many speculator mad money during the decline of the stock market by fishing in troubled waters.
sentences.cn: 在股票行情看跌期间,许多投机商混水摸鱼,从中获利.

sentences.en: Politicians and the media throw the word speculator about abusively.
sentences.cn: 政客和媒体滥用投机这个词,我怀疑很少有人真的问过投机的真实意义.

sentences.en: The ciritics assessed him a political speculator rather than a statesman.
sentences.cn: 批评家认为他根本不是政治家,而只是个政治投机者.

sentences.en: The lifetime of an average speculator is measured in months, not years.
sentences.cn: 大部分新手崩溃, 退出了.

sentences.en: The speculator's chief enemies are always boring from within.
sentences.cn: 投机者最大的敌人总是来自自身,也就是感到乏味.
